title: GanGREEN
body_text:
PondScum Divided:
MARZARELLA, EDWARDS go one-on-one
That's right, they've split! The rebellious, callus group that has unquestionably left an indelible mark on the sport has called it quits! And to think it was what, two, three months ago the controversial clan stood aligned as a unit, conquering the Monmouth University Co-ed League - my how times have changed.
Blocking extraordinaire
Ray Marzarella
, light and agile
Michael Edwards
have willingly agreed to this dissection of
PondScum
. But questions remain unanswered ...
Is it merely a question of "who is the better man?" Does either combatant have a hidden agenda? One musn't forget, Edwards has steamrolled over some of the greatest to ever compete and remains to this very day,
undefeated
. Is it the blocking genius who intends to end that deadly streak once and for all? Is "The Crazy One" simply searching for another victim? My oh my.
With all that said, there is no denying the brutalization this encounter will entail. Catch
Ray Marzarella vs. Mike Edwards
at DODGEBALL 122, live from Wall High School, January 19.
body_html:
PondScum Divided:
MARZARELLA, EDWARDS go one-on-one
That's right, they've split! The rebellious, callus group that has unquestionably left an indelible mark on the sport has called it quits! And to think it was what, two, three months ago the controversial clan stood aligned as a unit, conquering the Monmouth University Co-ed League - my how times have changed.

Blocking extraordinaire Ray Marzarella, light and agile Michael Edwards have willingly agreed to this dissection of PondScum. But questions remain unanswered ...

Is it merely a question of "who is the better man?" Does either combatant have a hidden agenda? One musn't forget, Edwards has steamrolled over some of the greatest to ever compete and remains to this very day, undefeated. Is it the blocking genius who intends to end that deadly streak once and for all? Is "The Crazy One" simply searching for another victim? My oh my.

With all that said, there is no denying the brutalization this encounter will entail. Catch Ray Marzarella vs. Mike Edwards at DODGEBALL 122, live from Wall High School, January 19.
